input_sources.content:
Project: Task Management Dashboard

Objective: Build a comprehensive task management application similar to Todoist or Asana, with AI-powered features.

Core Features:
1. User Authentication & Authorization
2. Task Creation, Editing, and Management
3. Project Organization
4. Team Collaboration
5. Real-time Notifications
6. Calendar Integration
7. Time Tracking
8. Reporting & Analytics

Tech Stack Requirements:
- Frontend: React with TypeScript
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Database: MongoDB
- Real-time: WebSockets
- Authentication: JWT
- Deployment: AWS/Netlify

Target Timeline: 8 weeks for MVP
Team Size: 3 developers
Budget: $50,000

From: stakeholder@company.com
To: dev-team@company.com
Subject: Additional Requirements - Task Management App
Date: 2024-01-17

Team,

After our kickoff meeting, I've identified additional requirements:

High Priority:
1. Google Calendar and Outlook integration for deadline syncing
2. File attachments on tasks (up to 10MB per file)
3. Task templates for recurring workflows
4. Bulk task operations (edit, delete, move)
5. Advanced filtering and sorting options

Medium Priority:
1. Time tracking with billable hours
2. Commenting system on tasks
3. Task dependencies and subtasks
4. Custom project templates
5. Email notifications

Low Priority:
1. API access for third-party integrations
2. Export functionality (PDF, CSV)
3. Mobile app (future phase)
4. Advanced analytics and reporting

Please factor these into your architecture planning and user story creation.

Regards,
Stakeholder
